question: Who has won the 2017 French Presidential election?
explanation: Emmanuel Macron, a former civil servant and investment banker,  has won the 2017 Presidential election of France and will take office on May 14, 2017. With this, he will become the youngest President in French history and the youngest French head of state since Napoleon. Beside this, Macron will also become the first President from outside the two traditional main parties since the modern republic\'s foundation in 1958. He fought the election under the banner En Marche! a social-liberal political party founded by him on April 2016.
